attributes.action: to avoid many company bankruptcies, introduce a law to enable freezing of company bank accounts for non payment of invoices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to prevent businesses going bankrupt, if shown that a company(debtor) is excessively overdue payment of invoices,the law should be changed to allow application to a county court for an order to be issued to freeze their bank account effectively forcing them to stop trading until the said bills are paid. saving many businesses from bankruptcy or financial hardship.
